products.name: Iphone 16 pro
products.description: The iPhone 16 Pro features a stunning 6.7-inch OLED display, offering sharp visuals and vibrant colors. It comes with 128GB of storage, a powerful chipset, and advanced camera capabilities, making it ideal for photography, productivity, and entertainment. Built for speed, style, and performance.

products.name: Ultra HD Smart TV
products.description: This 65-inch Ultra HD Smart TV delivers breathtaking 4K visuals with HDR support, ensuring crisp details and vibrant colors. Its smart features provide access to apps like Netflix, YouTube, and more, making it a perfect choice for immersive home entertainment and streaming.

products.name: Wireless Headphones
products.description: These wireless headphones offer up to 30 hours of battery life and advanced noise cancellation for uninterrupted listening. Designed for comfort and performance, they deliver powerful audio, making them ideal for music, calls, or long flights.

products.name: Gaming Laptop Pro
products.description: The Gaming Laptop Pro is built for serious gamers, featuring an NVIDIA RTX 3070 GPU, 16GB RAM, and a smooth 144Hz display. Whether for high-end gaming or heavy multitasking, its powerful specs ensure fast, immersive performance and fluid gameplay.

products.name: Galaxy S23 Ultra
products.description: The Galaxy S23 Ultra features a bright 6.8-inch AMOLED screen and a powerful 200MP camera for sharp photos. It runs smoothly on a fast processor and supports fast and wireless charging. The phone has a sleek, durable design with water resistance.

products.name: iPhone 15 Pro
products.description: The iPhone 15 Pro offers a sharp 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display and is powered by the efficient A16 Bionic chip. It delivers smooth performance and vibrant visuals. The phone has a premium build, excellent camera quality, and runs iOS for seamless user experience.

products.name: Pixel 7 Pro
products.description: The Pixel 7 Pro features a 6.7-inch QHD+ OLED display with vivid colors and sharp details. Powered by Google’s Tensor G2 chip, it offers smooth performance and advanced AI features. The camera system excels in capturing high-quality photos and videos, especially in low light.

products.name: OnePlus 11
products.description: The OnePlus 11 comes with a 6.7-inch Fluid AMOLED display offering smooth visuals and vibrant colors. It’s powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor for fast and efficient performance. The phone is known for its strong performance and sleek design.

products.name: Xiaomi 13 Pro
products.description: The Xiaomi 13 Pro features a large 6.73-inch AMOLED display with rich colors. It’s equipped with Leica cameras that deliver excellent photo quality. Powered by a strong processor, it balances performance and value well.

products.name: Galaxy Z Flip 5
products.description: The Galaxy Z Flip 5 offers a unique 6.7-inch foldable display that combines style and functionality. Powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, it delivers fast performance. Its compact design folds easily, making it highly portable.

products.name: iPhone 14 Plus
products.description: The iPhone 14 Plus features a large 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display with sharp, vibrant visuals. It runs on the powerful A15 Bionic chip, ensuring smooth performance and efficient battery life. The phone offers excellent camera capabilities and a premium design.

products.name: Redmi Note 12 Pro
products.description: The Redmi Note 12 Pro comes with a 6.67-inch AMOLED display that delivers clear and bright visuals. Powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 1080 processor, it offers good performance for everyday tasks. It’s a budget-friendly phone with solid features.

products.name: Nothing Phone 2
products.description: The Nothing Phone 2 features a 6.7-inch LTPO OLED display with smooth refresh rates and vibrant colors. It’s powered by the Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1 chip, delivering strong performance. The phone stands out with its unique design and clean software experience.

products.name: ROG Phone 7
products.description: The ROG Phone 7 has a 6.78-inch AMOLED display designed for gamers, offering high refresh rates and vivid colors. Powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, it provides top-tier performance. The phone includes gaming-focused features and a robust design.

products.name: Galaxy A54
products.description: The Galaxy A54 features a 6.4-inch Super AMOLED display with bright, clear visuals. It runs on the Exynos 1380 processor, offering smooth everyday performance. This phone balances good features and affordability with a sleek design.

products.name: HP Pavilion 15
products.description: A reliable 15.6-inch Full HD laptop with Intel Core i5, 8GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. It’s ideal for everyday tasks like work, browsing, and media with smooth performance and a clean design.

products.name: Dell Inspiron 14
products.description: A compact 14-inch Full HD laptop powered by AMD Ryzen 5, 8GB RAM, and 256GB SSD. Great for students or casual users needing solid performance in a lightweight design.

products.name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3
products.description: This 15.6-inch laptop features an Intel Core i3 processor, 8GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. It's a budget-friendly option ideal for students and everyday multitasking.

products.name: Apple MacBook Air M1
products.description: The MacBook Air M1 features a 13.3-inch Retina display and Apple’s powerful M1 chip, paired with 8GB RAM and 256GB SSD. It's ultra-portable and delivers smooth performance, perfect for professionals and creatives.

products.name: Asus Vivobook 16
products.description: The Asus Vivobook 16 comes with a large 16-inch WUXGA display, AMD Ryzen 7 processor, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. It offers great performance for multitasking, entertainment, and productivity at a mid-range price.

products.name: Acer Aspire 5
products.description: The Acer Aspire 5 features a 15.6-inch Full HD display, Intel Core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, and a 512GB SSD. It’s designed for everyday productivity, combining smooth performance with a lightweight, professional look.

products.name: Microsoft Surface Laptop Go
products.description: The Microsoft Surface Laptop Go offers a 12.4-inch touchscreen, Intel Core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, and 128GB SSD. Its ultra-portable design and smooth Windows integration make it ideal for students and light professionals.

products.name: HP Spectre x360
products.description: The HP Spectre x360 is a premium convertible laptop featuring a 13.5-inch OLED display, Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and 1TB SSD. Its 2-in-1 design and sleek aluminum body make it perfect for both work and creativity on the go.

products.name: Dell XPS 13
products.description: The Dell XPS 13 is a sleek and compact ultrabook featuring a 13.4-inch FHD+ display, Intel Evo-certified Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD. It's known for its premium build, edge-to-edge screen, and exceptional performance for everyday productivity.

products.name: MSI Modern 14
products.description: The MSI Modern 14 is a lightweight laptop designed for students and professionals. It comes with a 14-inch Full HD display, Intel Core i5 processor, 8GB RAM, and 512GB SSD, offering smooth multitasking and portability for work or study on the go.

products.name: Samsung Crystal UHD 43"
products.description: This 43-inch Samsung Crystal UHD TV delivers stunning 4K visuals with HDR support, making movies and shows more vibrant. Powered by Tizen OS, it includes smart features like voice assistants, app streaming, and screen mirroring, offering great value for home entertainment.

products.name: LG NanoCell 50"
products.description: The 50-inch LG NanoCell TV offers enhanced color accuracy and sharp 4K visuals, thanks to NanoCell technology. It features AI ThinQ for smart voice control, Dolby Audio, and a sleek design, making it perfect for immersive and intuitive home viewing.

products.name: Sony Bravia X75 55"
products.description: Sony’s 55-inch Bravia X75 delivers stunning 4K UHD clarity with rich colors and smooth motion powered by the X1 4K Processor. With Android TV built-in, it supports Google Assistant, Chromecast, and a wide range of apps, offering a premium smart TV experience.

products.name: OnePlus Y Series 40"
products.description: The OnePlus Y Series 40 is a sleek Full HD LED Smart TV offering crisp visuals and vibrant colors. It runs on Android TV with built-in Chromecast, Google Assistant, and access to all popular streaming apps—ideal for budget-conscious buyers seeking a smart, compact entertainment solution

products.name: Redmi Smart TV 32"
products.description: The Redmi Smart TV 32 is a compact HD Ready Android TV designed for small rooms or personal entertainment. It features built-in Chromecast, Google Assistant, and PatchWall with smart content recommendations—perfect for users seeking smart features on a budget.

products.name: TCL 4K QLED 50"
products.description: The TCL 4K QLED 50 Smart TV offers vibrant picture quality with Quantum Dot technology, Dolby Vision, and a bezel-less design. Powered by Google TV, it supports voice control, multiple streaming apps, and smooth navigation—ideal for immersive home entertainment.

products.name: Vu Premium 55"
products.description: The Vu Premium 55 TV features a 4K LED display with Dolby Audio for clear sound and rich visuals. With smart TV capabilities, including popular apps and smooth connectivity, it delivers reliable performance and value for casual viewers and binge-watchers alike.

products.name: Panasonic 43"
products.description: The Panasonic 43 Full HD Smart LED TV offers excellent picture clarity with vivid colors and smooth motion. Built-in smart features allow access to popular apps, making it ideal for casual streaming and everyday entertainment.

products.name: Realme Smart TV X 43"
products.description: The Realme Smart TV X 43 delivers crisp Full HD visuals and a smooth Android TV experience. It’s compact, stylish, and well-suited for small living rooms or bedrooms, offering great value for budget-conscious users.

products.name: Philips Android TV 50"
products.description: This 50-inch Philips Android TV brings vibrant 4K UHD visuals with support for HDR content. It runs on Android TV, giving you access to Google Play apps, built-in Chromecast, and voice control, making it a great all-in-one entertainment choice.

products.name: Sony WH-1000XM4
products.description: Sony’s WH-1000XM4 are premium over-ear headphones offering top-tier active noise cancellation, up to 30 hours of battery life, and smart features like wear detection and adaptive sound control. They’re ideal for travel, work, and immersive audio experiences.

products.name: JBL Tune 760NC
products.description: The JBL Tune 760NC offers impressive active noise cancellation, 50-hour battery life with ANC off, and JBL’s signature bass-rich sound. These wireless over-ear headphones are lightweight, foldable, and great for everyday use, commuting, or long listening sessions.

products.name: Boat Rockerz 550
products.description: Boat Rockerz 550 are budget-friendly wireless over-ear headphones with a powerful 50mm driver that delivers deep bass and clear sound. Designed for comfort and long listening hours, they offer up to 20 hours of playback time and support Bluetooth as well as AUX connectivity

products.name: Apple AirPods Max
products.description: The Apple AirPods Max combines high-fidelity audio with active noise cancellation and spatial audio for immersive sound. Designed with a sleek aluminum build and breathable mesh headband, they offer seamless pairing with Apple devices, up to 20 hours of battery life, and a premium over-ear fit perfect for long listening sessions.

products.name: Realme Buds Wireless 2 Neo
products.description: The Realme Buds Wireless 2 Neo offers a lightweight and affordable neckband design with fast charging and 11.2mm bass boost drivers. With up to 17 hours of playback, magnetic earbuds, and IPX4 water resistance, it’s ideal for budget-conscious users who want decent sound and durability on the go.

products.name: boAt Nirvana 751 ANC
products.description: The boAt Nirvana 751 ANC headphones provide active noise cancellation (up to 33dB), 65-hour battery life (with ANC off), and immersive 40mm drivers. With a stylish foldable design, Bluetooth 5.0, and fast charging support, it offers a balanced mix of performance, portability, and price.

products.name: Bose QuietComfort 45
products.description: Bose QuietComfort 45 headphones are designed for unmatched comfort and exceptional noise cancellation. Featuring soft ear cushions, advanced ANC technology, and up to 24 hours of battery life, these headphones deliver premium audio for long listening sessions. Ideal for travel, work, or deep focus.

products.name: Noise Buds VS104
products.description: The Noise Buds VS104 are affordable true wireless earbuds offering up to 45 hours of total playtime with the case. Designed for everyday use, they feature touch controls, IPX5 water resistance, and clear call quality. Perfect for students and budget-conscious users seeking wireless convenience.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Buds2 Pro
products.description: Samsung Galaxy Buds2 Pro deliver premium audio with ANC (Active Noise Cancellation) and 360 Audio for an immersive listening experience. These true wireless earbuds are compact, lightweight, and support seamless connectivity with Samsung devices. Ideal for audiophiles and Galaxy ecosystem users.

cart.name: Ultra HD Smart TV
cart.description: This 65-inch Ultra HD Smart TV delivers breathtaking 4K visuals with HDR support, ensuring crisp details and vibrant colors. Its smart features provide access to apps like Netflix, YouTube, and more, making it a perfect choice for immersive home entertainment and streaming.
